dict.acceptation: 怜悯；同情；可惜的事；憾事；
对…表示怜悯；对…感到同情；

sent.orig: Should you not have had pity on your fellow servant, as I had pity on you?
sent.trans: 难道你不该怜悯你的同伴，如同我怜悯了你一样吗？

sent.orig: Pity me, pity me, O you my friends, for the hand of God has struck me!
sent.trans: 我的朋友，你们可怜可怜我！因为天主的手打伤了我。

sent.orig: Frollo stood looking at the little boy, and his heart filled with pity.
sent.trans: 弗罗洛站在那儿望着小男孩，心里充满了怜悯。

sent.orig: It is a great pity that such a beautiful girl should lead a life below stairs.
sent.trans: 这么漂亮的女子过着仆人般的生活，真是可惜。

sent.orig: It would be a pity to come to Maine without spending some time there.
sent.trans: 来缅因州而没有在那里花些时间，那将是遗憾的事情。
